item.title: Nix - The best package manager you should be using
item.description: This is an article I wrote for the upcoming Visionen issue “Nachwuchs”. The issue will be released in the coming weeks and this serves as a little sneak-peak. Have you ever tried to install a program, only for it to require some specific Python version, GCC to be exactly version 11, or some other random program you never even heard of? Additionally, you have to figure out where to install what and how, because everybody has their standard on how programs should be installed.
